page.title: 02A WALK IN ABBOTS BROMLEY.
page.content: We went out to look for things in Abbots Bromley. First we found the Alms houses and the date on it was 17O5. Then past that we saw the church and the Church House. In the church house a playgroup is held and so is a Sunday School. Then we walked across and found some old barns and then we went up the street to the institute and that is where another nursery school is. The Royal Oak is a pub and we saw that as we went by. The Hayward Marionettes is a puppet museum. It shows puppets of all kinds. The Bagot Arms is a pub. We had a look at the police station.
